creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
life_date: Morita Kakō ; Matsuki Heikichi, Publisher, Japanese
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Defeated Soldiers Boarding Rowboats to Escape after Our Battleship Sank Two Enemy Battleships in the Harbor of Incheon
